languages.text: Deals additional 30% damage as Fire while {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}Overheated Plasma{/g} has at least 2 ranks

languages.text: Если у персонажа есть 2 или более уровней {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}перегрева плазмокамеры{/g}, это оружие наносит дополнительно 30% {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g}.

Если у персонажа есть 2 или более уровней {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}перегрева плазмокамеры{/g}, это оружие наносит дополнительно 30% {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}プラズマセル過熱{/g}の２スタックがあれば、この武器は+30%追加{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}を与える。

traits.locale_text: 使用者が{g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}プラズマセル過熱{/g}の２スタックがあれば、この武器は+30%追加{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}を与える。

languages.text: Hat der Träger 2 oder mehr Stapel {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}Plasmazellen-Überhitzung{/g}, verursacht diese Waffe weitere 30 % Schaden als {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: While the wielder has 2 or more {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}plasma cell overheating{/g} stacks, this weapon deals an additional 30% damage as {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Hat der Träger 2 oder mehr Stapel {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}Plasmazellen-Überhitzung{/g}, verursacht diese Waffe weitere 30 % Schaden als {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g}.

languages.text: Si el portador tiene 2 o más acumulaciones de {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}Sobrecalentamiento de células de plasma{/g}, esta arma inflige un 30 % de daño adicional en forma de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g}.
languages.original_text: While the wielder has 2 or more {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}plasma cell overheating{/g} stacks, this weapon deals an additional 30% damage as {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador tiene 2 o más acumulaciones de {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}Sobrecalentamiento de células de plasma{/g}, esta arma inflige un 30 % de daño adicional en forma de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g}.

languages.text: 当装备者至少拥有2层{g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}等离子电池过热{/g}效果层数时，这把武器造成30%的额外伤害，额外伤害视为{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: While the wielder has 2 or more {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}plasma cell overheating{/g} stacks, this weapon deals an additional 30% damage as {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者至少拥有2层{g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}等离子电池过热{/g}效果层数时，这把武器造成30%的额外伤害，额外伤害视为{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}。

languages.text: Tant que l'utilisateur a au moins 2 cumuls de {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}Cellule de plasma en surchauffe{/g}, cette arme inflige 30 % de dégâts supplémentaires sous forme de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g}.
languages.original_text: While the wielder has 2 or more {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}plasma cell overheating{/g} stacks, this weapon deals an additional 30% damage as {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tant que l'utilisateur a au moins 2 cumuls de {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}Cellule de plasma en surchauffe{/g}, cette arme inflige 30 % de dégâts supplémentaires sous forme de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g}.

languages.text: Bu silah, onu kullanan kişide 2 veya daha fazla {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}plazma hücresi aşırı ısınması{/g} birikimi bulunduğunda {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}ateş hasarı{/g} olarak ilave %30 hasar verir.
